content.text:
# 2016 UK Music Video Awards

| previous = 2015
| next = 2017
| main =
}}
The 2016 UK Music Video Awards were held on 20 October 2016 to recognise the best in music videos from United Kingdom and worldwide. The nominations were announced on 21 September 2016. English musician Jamie XX won Video of the Year with "Gosh",  directed by Romain Gavras.
Video of the Year
{| class="wikitable" style="width:95%"
|- bgcolor="#bebebe"
! width="100%" |Video of the Year
|-
| valign="top" |
Jamie XX – "Gosh"  (Director: Romain Gavras)
|-
|}

{| class="wikitable" style="width:95%"

|-
| valign="top" |
'''Mike O'Keefe
| valign="top" |
Vaughan Arnell
|-

| valign="top" |
Miike Snow – "Genghis Khan"  (Director: Ninian Doff)
